CustomField.description: When an invoice is overpaid by an amount less than or equal to the value of this field, a new credit memo will be created and applied against the customer's account automatically.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When an invoice is overpaid by an amount less than or equal to the value of this field, a new credit memo will be created and applied against the customer's account automatically.
CustomField.label: Invoice Overpayment Credit Memo Limit
